dmca.title: Author complains of copied article
dmca.body:
My article, 15 Suggestions to Re-"Mind" and Reduce Stress has been posted at
the following URL's http://taptukemreerkoc.blogspot.com/ and is listed as
"RELATED ARTICLE"
about half way down this blog's page. The date of the posted infringement
is April 8, 2005. The contact e-mail posted for [Private], who posted my
article, is the same individual known as [Private] whose e-mail is posted at
this same blog as [Private] [private]@fatih.edu.tr As in my previous
report, though I asked removal of my article by the students he, [Private]
sponsors, he was unresponse to their removal previously after acknowledging
the postings of my article. No other contact e-mail is listed at the site.

"I have a good faith belief that use
of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing
web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the
law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury,
that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the
copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

None of my publishers nor myself have given permission to any individual at
the above web blog to publish my article, 15 Suggestions to Re-"Mind" and
Reduce Stress.

I would appreciate the Blogger Support Team as the sponsor of this blog
removing my article as quickly as possible.

Sincerely,

[Private]
www.drpokea.com
[Private]@bsn1.net
